abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the mission was to
            oversee the Strengthening Public Information, Monitoring and
            Evaluation for Results Management Project (STATCAP). The
            mission thanks the authorities for taking the time dedicated
            to the mission as well as for their professionalism and
            warmth. With regard to the technical and financial execution
            component, the mission examined the following topics: 1
            Financial Management; 2 Audit; 3 Financial Reports; 4 Disbursements.
